headline: Does Halliburton’s Recent Share Price Recovery Still Offer Attractive Value in 2025?
summary: Wondering if Halliburton is still a smart energy play at today’s price, or if most of the upside is already baked in? This breakdown will help you decide whether the stock offers real value or just headline appeal. The share price has been choppy lately, down 0.8% over the last week but still up 9.2% in the past month, with a 10.5% gain over the last year and 63.3% over five years, which hints at both recovery and remaining volatility after a 22.8% drop over three years.
